greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

extracted_data_phrases: by exercising unjust power or authority over them
oppression.question: Did I, through my words or actions, mistreat others by exercising unjust power or authority over them?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

oppression.question: Did I use my power, authority, or influence to unjustly mistreat others?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the blessings in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I silently resented others' achievements and secretly wished they wouldn't have been so successful?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: such as their successful careers or happy relationships
envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others' blessings, such as their successful careers or happy relationships, would somehow be taken away from them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

envy.question: Have I ever harbored envy towards others' accomplishments, and secretly wished they would lose their success?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others, particularly those I am close to, with vulgar or inappropriate language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control when using words that violated others' dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in using words to speak to others in a manner that was unbecoming or hurtful
in a manner that was unbecoming or hurtful
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in using words to speak to others in a manner that was unbecoming or hurtful?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Have you overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, potentially leading to excess and a lack of self-control?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, potentially demonstrating an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and neglecting the virtue of temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating and drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when it comes to enjoying meals and snacks with family or during social gatherings?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, in casual conversations with friends or family members?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

through casual conversations or online interactions
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private matters about others, even if they were true, through casual conversations or online interactions?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I spoken with pleasure in criticizing others, even if what I shared was true?

extracted_data_phrases: on a Sunday that could have been avoided , demonstrating impiety by neglecting my day of rest
by neglecting my day of rest
impiety.question: Did I engage in unnecessary work on a Sunday that could have been avoided, demonstrating impiety by neglecting my day of rest?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
